title: Xabi Alonso announces retirement: 11 reasons the Liverpool legend is the world's coolest footballer
text:
Share this video Watch Next 
You have to be a genuinely awesome human to provoke this sort of response from your former colleagues. 3. His taste in music 
Mr Cool loves a bit of Lou Reed and the Velvet Undergound. 
If you don't know anything about Lou Reed and the Velvet Undergound, then basically, YOU ARE NOT AS COOL AS XABI ALONSO. 4. The fact he can make a 'stawberry blonde' beard look good (Photo: A. Pretty/Getty Images) 
A true test of a man's cool status. 5. This gif 6. Somehow making a ridicuolus squad number seem acceptable (Photo: A. Hassenstein) 
A central midfielder wearing number three? A hanging offence in most cases. 
In the case of Xabi Alonso? The sort of effortlessly innovative style decision that will see holding midfielders everywhere thinking they should be wearing number three. 7. His reaction to taking the worst corner in the history of football 
Bayern Munich vs Arsenal, November 2015. As ever, Alonso looks cooler than any of us ever will as he steps up to take a cornerâ€¦ before booting the corner flag instead of the ball. 
Calamity. 
So how did Alonso react? In the way only he could - by immediately reclaiming all his lost cool points with one superb move: 8. This glorious image (Photo: Alexandra Beier) 
Most men would struggle to look anything other than absurd at Oktoberfest, the German beer festival in Munich. 
Xabi Alonso? He ends up looking like the world's most awesome husband and father. 9. This celebration 
Gareth Bale scores goal that sees Real Madrid beat Atletico in the 2014 Champions League Final. Xabi Alonso - suspended for the match - is not even allowed to sit on the Real bench. 
Does that stop him from joining in the celebrations? Not a chance: 10. His determination to say hello to an old friend 
At the 2014 Champions League final, Xabi went and sought out Stevie in ITV's studio, just so he could grab a handshake: Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now 11. And, on that subject, this touch of class 
Regardless of your opinion on Gerrard (we're looking at you, Man United fans), that tweet - posted when Alonso's former midfield pal announced his retirement - confirms the only adjective that can be used when describing the Spaniard. 
COOL. Is Xabi Alonso the world's coolest footballer? 0+ VOTES SO FAR
